text: Warcraft is a video game series made by Blizzard Entertainment. The games in this series are real-time strategy games, where players play as their characters and gain experience to level up. == Series == The different games from the series are Warcraft: Orcs and Humans, Warcraft 2: Battle.net edition (with an expansion pack) and Warcraft 3 and its expansion pack, The Frozen Throne. The most successful game of the series is The Frozen Throne expansion pack, which sold more than 12 million copies. The MMORPG World of Warcraft is based on these games. Blizzard Entertainment also created World of Warcraft, which was published by Vivendi Games. == References == == Other websites == * The History of Warcraft * Warcraft series official website Category:Video game series
title: Warcraft
